data.html_text:
Hey @Esraa, I scraped Reddit posts related to CTFs hosting. Here is the link to the file: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1piY4YObVKMawU9KpW1rVZIWS41YUmxFqaH37CSKdqqo/edit?usp=sharing I recommend you upload it to ChatGPT along with the strategy you created, with the following prompt: I am uploading a Google Sheet that contains Reddit posts related to hosting CTFs, building cyber labs, and running cybersecurity competitions. Please analyze all the posts in the sheet and provide a structured market analysis. Specifically, give me:
  1. Market Pain Points
    • Extract the most common frustrations, blockers, and challenges people mention when hosting or preparing CTFs or cyber labs.
    • Group them into themes (e.g., technical setup, infrastructure reliability, challenge creation, budget constraints, etc.).
  2. Strengths of Simulations Labs (Relative to Market Needs)
    • Based on the pain points you extract, identify which of them Simulations Labs solves directly.
    • Highlight our strongest competitive advantages from the user's perspective (e.g., no DevOps, fast deployment, isolation, scalability, templates, etc.).
    • Phrase strengths the way Reddit users would naturally value them.
  3. Direct Competitors (from the Reddit data)
    • Identify any platforms, tools, or services mentioned by name.
    • Categorize them as:
      • Direct competitors (CTF hosting / lab platforms)
      • Adjacent tools (used but not in the same category)
      • Internal DIY solutions (self-hosted infra, Docker setups, VMs, cloud services)
  4. Market Opportunities
    • Identify gaps that Reddit users complain about that no tool is solving well.
    • Highlight potential product or marketing opportunities.
  5. Market Language & Messaging Insights
    • Extract the exact wording users frequently use to describe their needs or struggles.
    • Provide recommended messaging angles that align with how the market talks.
  6. User Segments Identified in the Posts
    • Group users into segments (e.g., CTF organizers, educators, student clubs, security teams, hobbyists).
    • Describe each segment’s needs based on the posts.
  7. Anything Else You Find Important
    • Any surprising insights, common misconceptions, wishlist items, or patterns in the conversations.
Deliver everything in a clean, structured format.
data.text:
Hey https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1208485999028683,

I scraped Reddit posts related to CTFs hosting.

Here is the link to the file: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1piY4YObVKMawU9KpW1rVZIWS41YUmxFqaH37CSKdqqo/edit?usp=sharing

I recommend you upload it to ChatGPT along with the strategy you created, with the following prompt:

I am uploading a Google Sheet that contains Reddit posts related to hosting CTFs, building cyber labs, and running cybersecurity competitions.
Please analyze all the posts in the sheet and provide a structured market analysis. Specifically, give me:
    Market Pain Points
        Extract the most common frustrations, blockers, and challenges people mention when hosting or preparing CTFs or cyber labs.
        Group them into themes (e.g., technical setup, infrastructure reliability, challenge creation, budget constraints, etc.).
    Strengths of Simulations Labs (Relative to Market Needs)
        Based on the pain points you extract, identify which of them Simulations Labs solves directly.
        Highlight our strongest competitive advantages from the user's perspective (e.g., no DevOps, fast deployment, isolation, scalability, templates, etc.).
        Phrase strengths the way Reddit users would naturally value them.
    Direct Competitors (from the Reddit data)
        Identify any platforms, tools, or services mentioned by name.
        Categorize them as:
            Direct competitors (CTF hosting / lab platforms)
            Adjacent tools (used but not in the same category)
            Internal DIY solutions (self-hosted infra, Docker setups, VMs, cloud services)
    Market Opportunities
        Identify gaps that Reddit users complain about that no tool is solving well.
        Highlight potential product or marketing opportunities.
    Market Language & Messaging Insights
        Extract the exact wording users frequently use to describe their needs or struggles.
        Provide recommended messaging angles that align with how the market talks.
    User Segments Identified in the Posts
        Group users into segments (e.g., CTF organizers, educators, student clubs, security teams, hobbyists).
        Describe each segment’s needs based on the posts.
    Anything Else You Find Important
        Any surprising insights, common misconceptions, wishlist items, or patterns in the conversations.
Deliver everything in a clean, structured format.

data.html_text: I reviewed the data that came from the file you sent and the data generated by ChatGPT with the prompt you provided. But I feel that these parts are just some of the things we can add to the gaps and to the competitors section. I still believe that the platform’s strength and advantages being no-DevOps with new and diverse scenarios are not the only things that will highlight the platform’s power. And that the scope for the first three months must include financial companies until we see which of the three segments we identified will perform best with us what do you think ? @Youssef Khafaga @Fouad Nasseredin
data.text:
I reviewed the data that came from the file you sent and the data generated by ChatGPT with the prompt you provided. But I feel that these parts are just some of the things we can add to the gaps and to the competitors section. I still believe that the platform’s strength and advantages  being no-DevOps with new and diverse scenarios  are not the only things that will highlight the platform’s power. And that the scope for the first three months must include financial companies until we see which of the three segments we identified will perform best with us

what do you think ?

data.html_text: Sure, the goal from the data and prompt is to fill the gaps in the strategy (not to replace it). As for financial companies, I don’t believe they are our target audience. However, let’s schedule a meeting to discuss your point of view and make a final decision. @Esraa
data.text:
Sure, the goal from the data and prompt is to fill the gaps in the strategy (not to replace it). As for financial companies, I don’t believe they are our target audience. However, let’s schedule a meeting to discuss your point of view and make a final decision.

data.html_text:
<body>انا سمعت الحلقة تاني بالتفصيل و فعلا مش شايفة مدخل لاي حاجة تنفع ل simulations ;abs 

ممكن ابقى غلط بس هو حتى كلام نوت بوك مش مقنع و مش موجود من لاساس 

انا عارفة انه ممكن يبقى ادق مني بس انا مصدقة اللي سمعته 
فاهمين فصدي 
انا باستخدام كل ال tools اللي في ايدي عشان اطلع بيها فيديوهات تانية و خلوني كل ما اطلع حاجة جديدة على مدار الايام الباقية اعمل ابديت بيها 

و هدخل امجد ينفذ معايا لاني حسيت ان كوالتي الفيديو اللي عملته مكنتش افضل حاجة ليكم</body>

data.html_text:
Hey @Esraa, I scraped Reddit posts related to CTFs hosting. Here is the link to the file: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1piY4YObVKMawU9KpW1rVZIWS41YUmxFqaH37CSKdqqo/edit?usp=sharing I recommend you upload it to ChatGPT along with the strategy you created, with the following prompt: I am uploading a Google Sheet that contains Reddit posts related to hosting CTFs, building cyber labs, and running cybersecurity competitions. Please analyze all the posts in the sheet and provide a structured market analysis. Specifically, give me:
  1. Market Pain Points
    • Extract the most common frustrations, blockers, and challenges people mention when hosting or preparing CTFs or cyber labs.
    • Group them into themes (e.g., technical setup, infrastructure reliability, challenge creation, budget constraints, etc.).
  2. Strengths of Simulations Labs (Relative to Market Needs)
    • Based on the pain points you extract, identify which of them Simulations Labs solves directly.
    • Highlight our strongest competitive advantages from the user's perspective (e.g., no DevOps, fast deployment, isolation, scalability, templates, etc.).
    • Phrase strengths the way Reddit users would naturally value them.
  3. Direct Competitors (from the Reddit data)
    • Identify any platforms, tools, or services mentioned by name.
    • Categorize them as:
      • Direct competitors (CTF hosting / lab platforms)
      • Adjacent tools (used but not in the same category)
      • Internal DIY solutions (self-hosted infra, Docker setups, VMs, cloud services)
  4. Market Opportunities
    • Identify gaps that Reddit users complain about that no tool is solving well.
    • Highlight potential product or marketing opportunities.
  5. Market Language & Messaging Insights
    • Extract the exact wording users frequently use to describe their needs or struggles.
    • Provide recommended messaging angles that align with how the market talks.
  6. User Segments Identified in the Posts
    • Group users into segments (e.g., CTF organizers, educators, student clubs, security teams, hobbyists).
    • Describe each segment’s needs based on the posts.
  7. Anything Else You Find Important
    • Any surprising insights, common misconceptions, wishlist items, or patterns in the conversations.
Deliver everything in a clean, structured format.
data.text:
Hey https://app.asana.com/0/profile/1208485999028683,

I scraped Reddit posts related to CTFs hosting.

Here is the link to the file: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1piY4YObVKMawU9KpW1rVZIWS41YUmxFqaH37CSKdqqo/edit?usp=sharing

I recommend you upload it to ChatGPT along with the strategy you created, with the following prompt:

I am uploading a Google Sheet that contains Reddit posts related to hosting CTFs, building cyber labs, and running cybersecurity competitions.
Please analyze all the posts in the sheet and provide a structured market analysis. Specifically, give me:
    Market Pain Points
        Extract the most common frustrations, blockers, and challenges people mention when hosting or preparing CTFs or cyber labs.
        Group them into themes (e.g., technical setup, infrastructure reliability, challenge creation, budget constraints, etc.).
    Strengths of Simulations Labs (Relative to Market Needs)
        Based on the pain points you extract, identify which of them Simulations Labs solves directly.
        Highlight our strongest competitive advantages from the user's perspective (e.g., no DevOps, fast deployment, isolation, scalability, templates, etc.).
        Phrase strengths the way Reddit users would naturally value them.
    Direct Competitors (from the Reddit data)
        Identify any platforms, tools, or services mentioned by name.
        Categorize them as:
            Direct competitors (CTF hosting / lab platforms)
            Adjacent tools (used but not in the same category)
            Internal DIY solutions (self-hosted infra, Docker setups, VMs, cloud services)
    Market Opportunities
        Identify gaps that Reddit users complain about that no tool is solving well.
        Highlight potential product or marketing opportunities.
    Market Language & Messaging Insights
        Extract the exact wording users frequently use to describe their needs or struggles.
        Provide recommended messaging angles that align with how the market talks.
    User Segments Identified in the Posts
        Group users into segments (e.g., CTF organizers, educators, student clubs, security teams, hobbyists).
        Describe each segment’s needs based on the posts.
    Anything Else You Find Important
        Any surprising insights, common misconceptions, wishlist items, or patterns in the conversations.
Deliver everything in a clean, structured format.

data.html_text:
<body>انا سمعت الحلقة تاني بالتفصيل و فعلا مش شايفة مدخل لاي حاجة تنفع ل simulations ;abs 

ممكن ابقى غلط بس هو حتى كلام نوت بوك مش مقنع و مش موجود من لاساس 

انا عارفة انه ممكن يبقى ادق مني بس انا مصدقة اللي سمعته 
فاهمين فصدي 
انا باستخدام كل ال tools اللي في ايدي عشان اطلع بيها فيديوهات تانية و خلوني كل ما اطلع حاجة جديدة على مدار الايام الباقية اعمل ابديت بيها 

و هدخل امجد ينفذ معايا لاني حسيت ان كوالتي الفيديو اللي عملته مكنتش افضل حاجة ليكم</body>
data.text:
انا سمعت الحلقة تاني بالتفصيل و فعلا مش شايفة مدخل لاي حاجة تنفع ل simulations ;abs 

ممكن ابقى غلط بس هو حتى كلام نوت بوك مش مقنع و مش موجود من لاساس 

انا عارفة انه ممكن يبقى ادق مني بس انا مصدقة اللي سمعته 
فاهمين فصدي 
انا باستخدام كل ال tools اللي في ايدي عشان اطلع بيها فيديوهات تانية و خلوني كل ما اطلع حاجة جديدة على مدار الايام الباقية اعمل ابديت بيها 

و هدخل امجد ينفذ معايا لاني حسيت ان كوالتي الفيديو اللي عملته مكنتش افضل حاجة ليكم
